attributes.additional_details: its outrageous in times such as these that companies are squeezing money out of hard working individuals for profit, energy companies are making millions if not billions in profit per year and are continually increasing the cost of running the home.  i suggest that the grid and all energy companies be merged and nationalised, profit made should be used to build the green energy industry, wind turbines, geothermal, solar, and invest in energies such as thorium reactors, this issue needs to be addressed not only should we be heading for green but in doing this we can become an independent nation.
